prompt_base: raw photo, cinematic film still, portrait of a (massive muscular Japanese warrior:1.2), spiky (messy radiant hair:1.1), fierce battle-hardened expression, intense gaze, 8k uhd
feature_prompt: highly detailed skin pores, (visible sweat and battle grime:1.2), individual hair strands, source palette preservation, identical color matching, (matching torn fabric weave texture:1.2), cinematic battle lighting, film grain, sharp focus
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, (3d render:1.3), (cgi:1.3), (toy:1.4), (plastic:1.3), (doll:1.3), mannequin, smooth skin, airbrushed, low quality, (friendly smile:1.3), modern clothes, clean skin
